Functions

psi_gauss_3d(x, y, z, a_x = 1.0, a_y = 1.0, a_z = 1.0, x_0 = 0.0, y_0 = 0.0, z_0 = 0.0, k_0 = 0.0)

Gaussian wave packet of width a and momentum k_0, centered at x_0

Attributes

res_x

supersolids.fft_test2.psi_gauss_3d(x, y, z, a_x=1.0, a_y=1.0, a_z=1.0, x_0=0.0, y_0=0.0, z_0=0.0, k_0=0.0)[source]

Gaussian wave packet of width a and momentum k_0, centered at x_0

Parameters

  • x – mathematical variable

  • y – mathematical variable

  • z – mathematical variable

  • a_x (float) – Stretching factor in x direction (np.sqrt(2) * std_deviation)

  • a_y (float) – Stretching factor in y direction (np.sqrt(2) * std_deviation)

  • a_z (float) – Stretching factor in z direction (np.sqrt(2) * std_deviation)

  • x_0 (float) – Mean spatial x of pulse

  • y_0 (float) – Mean spatial y of pulse

  • z_0 (float) – Mean spatial z of pulse

  • k_0 (float) – Group velocity of pulse

supersolids.fft_test2.res_x = 512
